mapper.insert: insert into tb_show(show_id, user_id, hall_id, title, c_role, genre, start_day, end_day, runningtime, viewing_age, notice_img, dis_img, event_img, detail_img, poster) values(#{show_id}, #{user_id}, #{hall_id}, #{title}, #{c_role}, #{genre}, #{start_day}, #{end_day}, #{runningtime}, #{viewing_age}, #{notice_img}, #{dis_img}, #{event_img}, #{detail_img}, #{poster})
mapper.select: SELECT show_id from tb_show where show_id like '%SHOW%'
SELECT * FROM tb_hall WHERE h_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{h_name}, '%') ORDER BY hall_id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_hall WHERE h_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{h_name}, '%')
SELECT * FROM tb_show WHERE show_id = #{show_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_show SET hall_id = #{hall_id}, title = #{title}, c_role = #{c_role}, genre = #{genre}, start_day = #{start_day}, end_day = #{end_day}, runningtime = #{runningtime}, viewing_age = #{viewing_age}, notice_img = #{notice_img}, dis_img = #{dis_img}, event_img = #{event_img}, detail_img = #{detail_img}, poster = #{poster} WHERE show_id = #{show_id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, h.h_name, h.miniHall FROM tb_show s INNER JOIN tb_hall h ON s.hall_id = h.hall_id WHERE s.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY s.end_day desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_show s INNER JOIN tb_hall h ON s.hall_id = h.hall_id WHERE s.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')

SELECT s.*, h.h_name, h.miniHall FROM tb_show s INNER JOIN tb_hall h ON s.hall_id = h.hall_id WHERE s.user_id = #{user_id} AND ( (s.start_day <= #{currentDate} AND s.end_day >= #{currentDate}) OR (s.start_day > #{currentDate}) ) ORDER BY CASE WHEN s.start_day <= #{currentDate} AND s.end_day >= #{currentDate} THEN 1 WHEN s.start_day > #{currentDate} THEN 2 END, s.start_day LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_show s INNER JOIN tb_hall h ON s.hall_id = h.hall_id WHERE s.user_id = #{user_id} AND ((s.start_day <= #{currentDate} AND s.end_day >= #{currentDate}) OR (s.start_day > #{currentDate}))
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_show s INNER JOIN tb_hall h ON s.hall_id = h.hall_id WHERE s.user_id = #{user_id} AND s.end_day < #{currentDate}
SELECT s.*, h.h_name, h.miniHall FROM tb_show s INNER JOIN tb_hall h ON s.hall_id = h.hall_id WHERE s.show_id = #{show_id} and s.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT p.seat_level, d.dis_name, d.dis_rate, p.price FROM tb_show s INNER JOIN tb_price p ON p.show_id = s.show_id INNER JOIN tb_discount d ON d.show_id = s.show_id WHERE s.show_id = #{show_id} AND FIND_IN_SET(REPLACE(p.seat_level, ' ', ''), d.dis_range) > 0 ORDER BY p.price DESC, p.price*((100-d.dis_rate)*0.01) DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) from tb_show s inner join tb_discount d ON s.show_id = d.show_id WHERE d.show_id = #{show_id} and s.user_id = #{user_id} AND d.dis_end >= now()
SELECT COUNT(*) from tb_show s inner join tb_discount d ON s.show_id = d.show_id WHERE d.show_id = #{show_id} and s.user_id = #{user_id} AND d.dis_end < now()

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) from tb_show s inner join tb_price p ON s.show_id = p.show_id WHERE p.show_id = #{show_id} and s.user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT seat_level FROM tb_price WHERE show_id = #{show_id}

mapper.select: SELECT s.*, a.*, t.*, ac.a_name from tb_showcasting s inner join tb_acsch a ON s.casting_id = a.casting_id inner join tb_ticket t ON s.show_id = t.show_id inner join tb_actor ac ON s.actor_id = ac.actor_id WHERE s.show_id = #{show_id} and a.ticket_id = t.ticket_id order by t.ticket_date LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
